CustomField.description:
Used in the Approval process and validation rules to prevent a user from changing the status to Approved for Production from the UI. This field should not be on the page layout.
CRM-Enhanced Cases for Change Request Functionality (C Reinecke 2010/08)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please do not change this value. You are not supposed to see this field. Please request your system administrator to remove this field from the page layout.
CustomField.label: Submitted For Production Approval
